$Aldridge and Pinelli were injured on the play.  Pinelli had to be carried off the field.  He needed 8 stitches in his ankle which was spiked terribly; no bones were broken. Aldridge stubbed his toe.

$Blades injured his leg running into LF wall; he cut his leg so badly he was forced to leave the game.

$On the play at the plate, Ainsmith dropped the ball when O'Farrell slid into him and lost site of it.  Keen, waiting his turn at bat, picked up the ball and handed it to Ainsmith, during which Miller advanced to 3B.  The Cardinals swarmed Ump Finneran to protest.  After a conference with Ump McCormick, Finneran called Miller out due to Keen's interference.
Friberg was ejected by Ump O'Day for protesting the called 3rd strike too vigorously.

$Marquard was hit in the face by the batted ball and fell to the ground. After receiving a little attention, he walked to the bench and retired from the game.

$Olson purposely dropped the line drive.  Adams thought he caught it on the fly and attempted to return to 1B.  Statz scored while Fournier was running Adams down.
$Hit in the ribs
$Pitcher Grimes walked toward the plate to argue with Umpire Powell over the last ball, and while in earnest consultation with the arbiter, Statz stole 3B.
Felix was doubled trying to return to 1B. Southworth was ejected by Ump Pfirman for protesting the call at 1B.  Grimes seemed to have dropped the ball and spent several moments hunting for it.
